## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cca63cd37e035f2a065952377f5c8b77ac950f443c2ac3233ead4b6203f62d9c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'kss-node-handlebars-builder' @ 9.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
